quotes.quote: I tasted too what was called the sweet of revenge - but it was transient, it expired even with the object, that provoked it.
quotes.author: Ann Radcliffe

quotes.quote: There is no revenge so complete as forgiveness.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: An eye for an eye makes the whole world blind.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: If an injury has to be done to a man it should be so severe that his vengeance need not be feared.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: Life being what it is, one dreams of revenge.
quotes.author: Paul Gauguin

quotes.quote: Nothing inspires forgiveness quite like revenge.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: In taking revenge, a man is but even with his enemy; but in passing it over, he is superior.
quotes.author: Sir Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Revenge is a kind of wild justice, which the more man's nature runs to the more ought law to weed it out.
quotes.author: Sir Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Live well. It is the greatest revenge.
quotes.author: The Talmud
